Examples of how to specify FE mesh Output Utilities Files and Data Manipulations Plot and/or gather data from sequence of result files Read BedMachine data and create gridded interpolants and boundary coordinates Finds all batch jobs on the local cluster. Writes the diary into a text file, and then displays
Plot Utilities Plot mesh Plot scalar variable (plan-view) Plot scalar variable as a 3D surface QuiverColorGHG Plot tensor quantity such as strain rates Plot MUA boundary Plot grounding lines Plot boundary conditions Plot upper and lower surfaces and bedrock Finds an existing figure with a specified name, otherwise creates one with that name Plots the results in a inverse restart file Plots variables, calving fronts and grounding lines
Computational Utilities Integrate nodal quantities over the computational domain FE natural inner product and norm of nodal quantities Calculate the root-mean-square deviation/error between two nodal variables Calculates x and y derivatives of a nodal quantity Determine if a point is close to a line. Project integration-point values onto nodes. GLgeometry EleBasedGL IceSheetIceShelves FindAllNodesWithinGivenRangeFromGroundingLine Calculate nodal strain rates Calculate nodal strain rates and stresses Calculate ice-shelf melt rates from flux divergence Calculate ice volume above flotation (VAF), ice volume and grounded area Tracer Conservation Equation Matern covariance C Guesstimation Determine if a floating node belongs to a subglacial lake or the ocean Determine if a floating node belongs to a subglacial lake or the ocean Find elements containing specific nodes Finds all elements within an element subset connected to a given node Calculates one single contour line of a given field over the (irregular) mesh Solves the Helmholz equation over the MUA mesh. Can also be used for smoothing. Calculates flux across grounding lines. Calculates flux across edges of grounded elements. Calculates the nodal and element mask of a given scalar quantity. Returns several pre-defined draft-dependent melt-parameterisations.
